title: Idle Planet Miner v2.0.10
text:
Idle Planet Miner v2.0.10
Tech Tree Games LLC– Freeware – Android iOS
out of 3381 votes
Idle Planet Miner is a captivating incremental idle clicker game that will have you hooked from the moment you start digging for ore. Embark on an interstellar mining adventure that will keep you engaged for hours on end!
IDLE PLANET MINER FEATURES
Idle Clicker Gameplay
- Automatically increase your mining rate in idle mode!
- Utilize your tapping skills to smash asteroids and collect valuable rare ore!
- Experience the satisfaction of mining as you earn coins and hire capable managers!
Incremental Upgrades
- Establish a thriving empire across the vastness of space!
- Recruit skilled managers to enhance your mining output!
- Develop innovative digging strategies by unlocking special projects!
Upgrade Your Mining Ship
- Dabble in the market by responding to supply and demand across the galaxy, maximizing your profits!
- Engage in extensive research to discover invaluable special projects that will boost your earnings!
- Showcase your skills by competing in multiplayer tournaments and determine who is the ultimate space miner!
- Be rewarded with permanent upgrades for your mining ship as you progress!
Idle Mining
- Earn valuable ore and coins even when you're not actively playing.
- Fulfill engaging quests to unlock premium rewards and enhance your experience.
If you're a fan of endless fun, Idle Planet Miner is the perfect incremental clicker/idle game that will captivate you. Immerse yourself in the addictive exploration of space as you dig your way through the stars, unearthing rare metals, coins, and more!
Overview
Idle Planet Miner is a Freeware software in the category Games & Entertainment developed by
Tech Tree Games LLC.
The latest version of Idle Planet Miner is v2.0.10, released on 01/06/2024. It was initially added to our database on 10/01/2023.
Idle Planet Miner runs on the following operating systems: Android/iOS.
Users of Idle Planet Miner gave it a rating of 5 out of 5 stars.
